name: qemu

base_image.doc-string: These are the U18.04 amd64 ebs images as of 17-Feb-2020

uploads.doc-string: Everthing in the source dir will be uploaded to target_directory

commands: apt-get install autoconf automake autotools-dev curl python3 libmpc-dev libmpfr-dev libgmp-dev gawk build-essential bison flex texinfo gperf libtool patchutils bc zlib1g-dev libexpat-dev -y
export PATH=/opt/riscv/bin:$PATH ; cd riscv-gnu-toolchain; make linux
